add.value: SELECT [name] FROM sysdatabases WHERE status & 512!=512 ORDER BY [name]
SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHECK_CONSTRAINTS ORDER BY CONSTRAINT_NAME
select TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_CATALOG='{0}' and TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE' and TABLE_NAME<>'dtproperties' order by TABLE_NAME
SELECT name AS Login_Name, type_desc AS Account_Type FROM sys.server_principals WHERE TYPE IN ('U', 'S', 'G') and name not like '%##%' ORDER BY name, type_desc
select TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS where TABLE_NAME not in ('syssegments', 'sysconstraints') order by TABLE_NAME
select ROUTINE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES where ROUTINE_TYPE = 'PROCEDURE' and ROUTINE_NAME not like 'dt_%' order by ROUTINE_NAME
select ROUTINE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES where ROUTINE_TYPE = 'FUNCTION' order by ROUTINE_NAME
SELECT name FROM sysobjects WHERE xtype='TR' ORDER BY NAME
